short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide the stars from goodreads community reviews to read about people experince without being influenced by their subjective rating.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best book discussions often happen in the reviews section. People share why they enjoyed the book, why the didn't, what they thought about the main characters or the plot.

However, seeing the star rating each reviewer gave to the book may create an unconscious and unwanted bias - so why have them there?

This extension hides the stars in the goodreads community reviews section (but leaves the stars on the book itself). Enjoy reading the reviews without being influenced by the individual ratings.
